mapper.sql: POID, RID, OID, QID, ProductName, Price, Quo_Price, Qty, Remark, UpdateDate, UpdateID, Status,SortName, BrandName, ModelName, SeriesName,DeliveryTime
mapper.select: select a.POID, a.RID, a.OID, a.QID, a.ProductName, a.Price, a.Quo_Price, a.Qty, a.Remark, a.UpdateDate, a.UpdateID, a.Status,a.SortName, a.BrandName, a.ModelName, a.SeriesName,a.DeliveryTime,c.PType,c.Stock from Ord_PreOrder a left join Req_requirement b on a.rid=b.rid left join pro_productsale c on b.psid=c.psid where a.OID = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sum(p.Quo_Price) as quoPrice from ord_preorder p left join quo_quotation q on q.QID = p.QID left join ord_order o on o.QID = p.QID where p.QID is not null and q.`Status` = 1 and o.Status = 5 and q.`UID` = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into Ord_PreOrder (POID, RID, OID, QID, ProductName, Price, Quo_Price, Qty, Remark, UpdateDate, UpdateID, Status, SortName, BrandName, ModelName, SeriesName,DeliveryTime) values (#{poid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{quoPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seriesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update Ord_PreOrder
RID = #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OID = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QID = #{qid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ProductName = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Quo_Price = #{quoPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateDate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdateID = #{updateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SortName = #{sortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BrandName = #{brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ModelName = #{modelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SeriesName = #{seriesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeliveryTime = #{deliverytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where POID = #{poid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Ord_PreOrder set RID = #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OID = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QID = #{qid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProductName = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Quo_Price = #{quoPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateDate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateID = #{updateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SortName = #{sortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BrandName = #{brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ModelName = #{modelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SeriesName = #{seriesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeliveryTime = #{deliverytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where POID = #{poid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
